attributes.action: consider recognising the democratically elected Hamas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Palestinian politicians successfully formed a unity Government under extraordinarily difficult circumstances, with Hamas becoming the majority elected party. The Palestinian people and Government deserve all the support and encouragement they can receive from the quartet, including individual members of the European Union and Her Majesty's Government. 

We must further focus upon urging the Israeli Government to stop its continuous human rights breaches and acts of collective punishment against defenceless Palestinians.
